CUSTOMER PORTAL
More than a safety net.
Your personal protector.
Platinum Insurance is a trusted Isle of Man provider of bespoke cover for people and business.
We offer an

expert one-to-one personal consultancy for all your protection needs, with a depth of knowledge and experience available at your convenience for absolute peace of mind.
For us, it’s never just a policy. It’s a partnership — and a promise to protect you, your business, and your loved ones.
Let’s get insurance off your to-do list.
Let’s get you the Platinum

standard.
Tailored cover that fits your needs
Compare the best deals from our trusted insurers
Guided advice from experts that value you
Bespoke cover for you
Why choose Platinum?
Bespoke cover
designed for you
Everyone has unique needs, and we ensure you only get the cover you require at the best possible price.
Time
Why choose Platinum?
Time is money,

and we’ll save you both
We don’t keep you hanging around. Our quote-to-policy process is designed to be swift and effective. And we won’t charge you mid-term adjustment fees.
Freedom
Why choose Platinum?
Freedom to choose
As an independent broker, we source quotes from a variety of trusted insurers to find you the best deal.
Personal
Why choose

Platinum?
The personal touch
We’re here to work with you, for you. For personal advice, reach out and tap into our team’s wealth of expertise whenever you need it most.
Personal Cover
At Platinum Life, we’re all about protecting you and the future financial security of those closest to you.
With our life insurance, critical illness and disability policies,

income protection and mortgage protection, we’re here to help you find the cover that truly meets your needs.

Protect your people, your assets, your bottom line.
Whatever the size and scale of your business, our range of solutions is designed to secure everything that matters to you and your organisation.
From

public liability and cyber security, to general insurance for small to medium-sized business, we’ll get it covered with a Platinum standard product.

GET A QUOTE
Protect Your Business
Safeguard your organisation with the Platinum standard,
designed

for your business.
GET A QUOTE
TALK TO US
How secure is your business?
If you’re a business owner, a director, or a landlord, you shouldn’t be struggling for an answer.
At Platinum Insurance, we’re here to act as a trusted partner to organisations of all shapes and sizes — helping to protect every aspect of your business from your people to your bottom

line.
From shops, pubs, and farms to SMEs and multinational corporations, our focused approach and wealth of expertise enables us to work with you to ensure our proposition fits your needs.
Commercial Combined Insurance
Management Liability Insurance
Professional Indemnity Insurance
Cyber Liability Insurance
Property Owners Insurance
Farm & Agricultural

Insurance
Get the
Platinum Standard
Your Organisation Needs.
Contact us today to discuss your business insurance requirements or
get an initial quote
.
Commercial Combined Insurance
Flexible protection for Isle of Man businesses:
Insurance for offices, pubs, shops & retail, surgeries & clinics, restaurants & nightlife, hotels & guesthouses
Public

liability, product liability & employer liability
Building and material damage
Injuries and accidents in the workplace
Stock damage
Cyber attacks
Business interruption
Why do you need it?
In any business — no matter how well prepared you are — there’s always something unexpected on the horizon. With commercial combined insurance, you can choose to create a

package of unmatched protection that covers all the essentials your small to medium-sized business requires.
Talk to us today
to tailor your flexible, Platinum standard policy.
Why do you need it?
Decision-making always comes with a risk — but that shouldn’t hold back your business. Management liability insurance gives you as a company director, senior

manager, or officer the protection you need to manage your exposures. With Platinum backing you, you can get back to leading.
GET A QUOTE
TALK TO US
Management Liability
Insurance
Professional Indemnity Insurance
Why do you need it?
From sole traders to limited companies, mistakes can happen. If a client loses out financially or reputationally because of

work you’ve done for them, they could bring a compensation claim to your door. Professional indemnity insurance covers a breadth of self-employed people and businesses who provide a professional service, give advice, or handle confidential data and copyrighted materials. It’s even a requirement in certain professions.
Talk to us today
to see where you

stand — and let Platinum take the pressure off.
GET A QUOTE
TALK TO US
Why do you need it?
It seems every day that we hear about it: another large organisation taken down by a malicious cyber-attack. You might have done all you can to secure your business against it — but the threat is always evolving, and sensitive data is at risk. Our cyber liability

coverage can help protect your business against the impact of cybercrime, and the resulting financial and reputational costs.
GET A QUOTE
TALK TO US
Cyber Liability
Insurance
Property Owners
Insurance
Why do you need it?
If you’re a property owner or landlord, your priority should be to uphold your legal responsibilities whilst also protecting your

investment. Whether you have a small-to-large portfolio of residential rental flats and houses, or you own a number of commercial offices or retail spaces, we’re here to get you covered. From building and structural cover to accidental damage and liability,
talk to us today
about our comprehensive property owners insurance packages.
GET A QUOTE
TALK TO

US
Why do you need it?
On the farm, your life is your livelihood. We understand your daily grind — and we know that it depends on a number of moving parts. Our experts are here to help you keep it all running with a range of cover for a variety of farms, from livestock and farm contents insurance, to agricultural vehicle cover and beyond.
GET A QUOTE
TALK

TO US
